title: How to add, delete edit username from /etc/passwd
body:
There is adduser and deluser. Use man deluser for details.

EDIT: i missed the C part in the question.

man is also your friend in this case. With man 3 deluser you can ask if there is anything in stdlib called like that. Read http://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/3586/what-do-the-numbers-in-a-man-page-mean for more informations on that.

This is not the case. You might want to call the unix tool from within C: How do you write a C program to execute another program?
